Description: AWS CloudFormation Sample Template to create an AWS App Runner Service from an existing ECR Repository

ServiceName.Description: Name of the App Runner service

ECRRepositoryUri.Description: URI of the existing ECR repository

ImageTag.Description: Tag of the image in the ECR repository

InstanceRoleArn.Description: ARN of the IAM Role to be assumed by the App Runner instance

AppRunnerServiceArn.Description: ARN of the App Runner Service

AppRunnerServiceUrl.Description: URL of the App Runner Service
